title: 11.2 Master Challenge 2
question: A company is developing IoT devices that collect and analyze user behavior within their homes to optimize energy usage and improve convenience. How would you address the ethical implications of data collection from IoT devices, particularly concerning user consent and data security? What measures would you propose to protect users' privacy while maintaining the functionality of these devices?
__language_type_hint: python - sql - htmlcss - scratch - javascript - R - pseudocode - java
